text:
Raskolnikov left the room, feeling a mix of emotions. “It all cuts both ways,” he kept saying to himself, feeling more confident than before. As he headed down the stairs, he smirked and thought, “Now we’ll make a fight for it.” But deep down, his malice was really directed at himself. He couldn’t shake off the shame and contempt he felt for his own cowardice. 😤

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov leaves the room feeling more confident, despite his internal shame and contempt for his own cowardice.
